register.description: The ISC a Region b Control Register defines the control fields for the ISC.

bitfield.description: Clear output priv attribute. If each bit is set then the outgoing priv bit is cleared. Has precedence over priv set bits.
Set outgoing priv attribute. If each bit is set then the outgoing priv bit is set.
No privID replacement, pass through value.
Make outgoing non-secure. Has precedence over secure enable bits.
Make outgoing secure. A value of 0xA enables, others disable.
Lock region. Once set the region values cannot be modified.
Enable region. A value of 0xA enables, others disable.

register.description: The ISC a Region b Control Register 2 defines the control fields for the ISC.

bitfield.description: No virtID replacement, pass through value.
Defines the output address type. 0 = physical no memory attributes. 1 = intermediate. 2 = virtual. 3 = physical with memory attributes.
